response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value and potential for you. I understand its worth to you is $800,000. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $750,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 750000}
